thread.title: Things got a little awkward when Buzzfeed’s editor was a guest on CNN
thread.title_full: Things got a little awkward when Buzzfeed’s editor was a guest on CNN

author: Jacob B.
title: Things got a little awkward when Buzzfeed’s editor was a guest on CNN
text:
Things got a little awkward when Buzzfeed’s editor was a guest on CNN Posted at 5:06 pm on January 15, 2017 by Jacob B. Share on Facebook Share on Twitter 
Buzzfeed editor Ben Smith was the guest of CNN’s Brian Stelter on Sunday. Stelter and Smith had a lengthy exchange about their reporting on the unverified dossier stating that Russia has compromising information that can be used against President-elect Donald Trump. CNN's @brianstelter and @BuzzFeedBen clash over Buzzfeed's decision to publish unconfirmed Trump memo https://t.co/snZbXEEQDC 
Smith said he was “proud” that his organization published all of the details. This is essentially an argument/debate of "who's less bad" https://t.co/S0h7kUjjz2 
— Cristian Nyari (@Cnyari) January 15, 2017 
Yep.
